title: 45 in. Fiberglass Handle Caprock Irrigation Shovel
description: The Razor-Back Caprock irrigation shovel is ideal for breaking up dense materials, such as clay, coral, rock and decomposed granite. Its 45 in. solid core fiberglass handle performs greatly during under the toughest digging jobs. This supremely durable shovel features a no-step, steel-tempered solid shank and a #2 blade with a 9 in. socket to strengthen the blade and handle connections. Designed to last, it is the ideal tool for professionals or homeowners to fracture harsh applications.
